title: Cant login to my LoL account
body: I cant login.... At first I tried to login then it didnt work, so I changed password. Didnt work. Then I changed region to my other account, didnt work so theres something thats fked up... :3 Help plzzz

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more info here, like what you mean exactly by it didn't work.  Are there any error messages?  Give some more details so I have a better understanding of the kind of issue you're experiencing.  Let me know!

You could have been banned. I made an account last week that i can't login to anymore because the name was inappropriate. At least that's what I think. I wasn't even told anything. i did the same thing trying to change password and it didn't work either so our problem is pretty much exactly the same.
